page.title: 10SHOPPING IN BROWNHILLS.
page.content: Shopping in Brownhills has changed considerably over the past 60 years. The shops today are much larger and so are fewer than in the past. In Brownhills in the 1920's you would find such shops as milliner's, blacksmith's and pawn brokers. There were 35 food shops at this time, but now there are only 21. However,Tesco's supermarket is ten times larger than a 1920's shop. A survey regarding shopping facilities held on a market day canvassed 46 ladies, the majority of whom shopped in Brownhills at least twice a week and this included their main weekly food shopping. Some ladies did shop in Walsall Wood and Bloxwich, but clothes were bought mainly in Walsall. Most people would like to see more childrens' clothes shops or department stores in Brownhills.
